item.title: About
item.description: My name is Nuttaphat Arunoprayoch (Chiang) I am a software engineer and a data analyst who is gliding around open-source development. I have experiences in using Python for various projects and applications ranging from its web frameworks, data manipulation, and data visualization for developing APIs, statistical dashboards, and machine learning models. Additionally, I have experiences developing and maintaining web-app projects using PHP (CodeIgniter), JS (Vanilla, jQuery, Vue.js). I am also no stranger with a variety of databases (e.
